name: @csstools/e2e--browserslist--package-json
description: Can you use PostCSS Preset Env with a browserslist in package.json?

scripts.test: BROWSERSLIST_ENV=development node ./index.mjs && BROWSERSLIST_ENV=production node ./index.mjs && BROWSERSLIST_ENV=legacy-edge node ./index.mjs && node ./use-plugin-option.mjs
